pacman

Class RegularPacMan

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.GameCharacter
      • pacman.PacMan
        • pacman.RegularPacMan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Visited

    public class RegularPacMan
extends PacMan
    Author:
    Tom Leibovich and Roee Shachar 'Regular PacMan' represents the regular pacman, meaning in no mighty or super mode. It contains its specific icons, and the accept method to determine the relations between him and the pacmans

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegularPacMan

        public RegularPacMan(GamePanel parent)
        A constructor for a new regular pacman at the beginning of the game. Uses the constructor of 'PacMan' and only determines the icons
        Parameters:
        parent - - Game Panel

      • RegularPacMan

        public RegularPacMan(GamePanel parent,
             int pixelLocationX,
             int pixelLocationY,
             int matrixLocationX,
             int matrixLocationY,
             int direction)
        A constructor for a new regular pacman once returning from a special mode, receives its position and direction from the old pacman
        Parameters:
        parent - - Game Panel
        pixelLocationX - - The X location of the old pacman in the image
        pixelLocationY - - The Y location of the old pacman in the image
        matrixLocationX - - The X location of the old pacman in the matrix
        matrixLocationY - - The Y location of the old pacman in the matrix
        direction - - The direction of the old pacman
